content: उपनम् {c1c} <ab>P.</ab> {@--1@} To come to, arrive at, approach, bend or tend towards. {@--2@} To befall, fall to the lot of, occur, happen (used by itself or with <ab>gen.</ab>, <ab>dat.</ab>, or <ab>acc.</ab> of person); मत्संभोगः कथमुपनमेत् स्वप्नजोऽपि <ls>Me. 91</ls>; तत्तस्योपनमेत् <ls>Bh. 2. 121</ls>; अंध आत्मने नोपनमति <ls>Bhāg.</ls>; अपैनं सहस्रं नमति <ls>Ait. Br.</ls> {@--3@} To share in. {%--<ab>Caus.</ab>%} {@--1@} To lead towards, introduce (with <ab>gen.</ab>). {@--2@} To offer, give.
